keywords.DESCRIPTION: As [#e600e6]Yuyuko[], the first #bAttack or #bSkill you play each turn grants a unique resource. If it's an #bAttack, gain #b1 #ySakura. If it's a #bSkill, gain #b1 #yButterfly. Cards with #yAetherial have additional effects depending on whether you have sufficient #ySakura or #yButterfly stacks.
Representing the energies of the Netherworld, #yPhantasm is used to calculate the effects of various cards. Its value is equal to the total sum of your #ySakura and #yButterfly stacks.

Representing the remnants of the departed, #ySakura stacks can trigger the additional effects of #yAetherial cards. If you have at least #b2 stacks, then once per turn whenever you gain #ySakura, you may choose 1 of 2 beneficial effects to activate.

Representing the souls of the dead, #yButterfly stacks can trigger the additional effects of #yAetherial cards. If you have at least #b2 stacks, then once per turn whenever you gain #yButterfly, you may choose 1 of 2 beneficial effects to activate.
A unique debuff that reduces damage dealt by #b2 for every #b2 stacks of this debuff (max. 5). Whenever an enemy with #yMoribund dies, you regain HP. A maximum of #b5 HP may be healed this way.
If a card with this keyword is discarded from your hand or exhausted, put a random card from your exhaust pile into your hand. That card gains #yEthereal for the rest of combat.

An unplayable #rCurse card that is #yEthereal. If it is in your hand at the end of your turn, all enemies lose HP and the potency of HP loss from all future #yReincarnation cards are increased. NL #yReincarnation's potency is displayed on the left side of your screen.
A playable, upgradable #rCurse card with #yRetain. When played, all enemies lose HP equal to the amount of #yMoribund stacks they have.
Whenever you play this card, shuffle the next card in the sequence into your draw pile.
After playing this card, immediately end your turn.
This card's effects can be triggered by either playing it or manually discarding it from your hand.
Any enemy that is not a #bminion, #yelite, or #rboss.
